Texts.Chs:
过于可爱的恐龙模样的小家伙们，群居习性，拥有扭曲现实的能力。他们幻想，幻想成真。

^orange;食性^reset;：素食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:

^orange;增益^reset;:
能量值上限^green;+10^reset;%
抗性：寒冷抗性^green;+20^reset;%，火焰抗性^green;+20^reset;%，毒素抗性^green;+20^reset;%，辐射抗性^green;+40^reset;%，射线抗性^green;+40^reset;%
免疫：窒息，重度辐射
较小的外形（3个物块的高度）

^orange;环境^reset;:
阿托罗斯生态：生命值上限^red;-20^reset;%，能量值上限^red;-20^reset;%

^orange;武器^reset;:
魔杖：伤害^green;+5^reset;%，防御^green;+5^reset;%
法杖：伤害^green;+10^reset;%，防御^green;+10^reset;%

^red;弱点^reset;:
减益：生命值上限^red;-20^reset;%
抗性：电系抗性^red;-10^reset;%，暗影抗性^red;-50^reset;%，物理抗性^red;-20^reset;%
Texts.Eng:
A Small, social, and overly cute reality-bending dinosaur-like things. They imagine, and reality follows suit.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  (Built-In)Small Profile (3 blocks tall)
  Energy x^green;1.1^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Cold, Fire, Poison, +^green;50^reset;% Radioactive, +^green;30^reset;% Cosmic
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Breath, Deadly Radiation

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Atropus biomes: Health x^red;0.8^reset; and -^red;20^reset;% E. Regen

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Wands: Damage & Protection x^green;1.05^reset;
  Staves: Damage & Protection x^green;1.1^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;10^reset;% Electric, -^red;50^reset;% Shadow, -^red;20^reset;% Physical.
  Health x^red;0.8^reset;
